title: Apricot and sultana slow cooker chicken tagine
ingredients: ['4 chicken breasts, cubed', '1 medium butternut squash, peeled and cubed', '1 large onion, chopped', '1 (400g) tin chickpeas', '100g sultanas', '80g dried stoned apricots', '500ml hot chicken or vegetable stock', '3 tablespoons fresh lemon juice', '3 tablespoons tomato puree', '5 heaped teaspoons mixed spice', '45g salted butter', '1 large bunch fresh coriander']
